--- value_subquery_select_as_leaf_typename.sql
(SELECT AS TypeName 1 AS i)
--- AST
&ast.ScalarSubQuery{
  Rparen: 26,
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select: 1,
    As: &ast.AsTypeName{
      As: 8,
      TypeName: &ast.NamedType{
        Path: []*ast.Ident{
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 11,
            NameEnd: 19,
            Name: "TypeName",
          },
        },
      },
    },
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Alias{
        Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 20,
          ValueEnd: 21,
          Base: 10,
          Value: "1",
        },
        As: &ast.AsAlias{
          As: 22,
          Alias: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 25,
            NameEnd: 26,
            Name: "i",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
(SELECT AS TypeName 1 AS i)
